ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Status field from being set backwards
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Draft (Manager)") &&
( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c), "In Review (Employee)") || ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c) , "Review Action Plan (Manager)" ) || ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Status__c) ,"Final Approval (Manager)" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status may not be moved back to previous stage.
